vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the Cities for Financial Empowerment Fund, Inc. for the Financial Empowerment Center Planning Grant in the amount of $20,000.00 to support a Financial Empowerment Centers planning project for the period February 1, 2021 through January 30, 2022; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Financial Empowerment Centers Grant Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Financial Empowerment Centers Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $20,000.00 - Financing: Cities for Financial Empowerment Fund, Inc. Grant Funds
